overview:
Sarah Golightly CEO and Co-Founder of GoLightly, Inc.

As CEO, Sarah Golightly provides strategic leadership for the company, managing marketing and corporate affairs. She also directs product marketing for the GoLightly platform, consulting with customers to help them maximize the social media community-building tools to create trusted communities that enliven their organizations.

Sarah is a pioneer in the online community space as well as an accomplished technologist with more than 10 years of experience designing enterprise web applications. Prior to co-founding GoLightly, she did design, branding, and web site development for Fortune 500 and Global 1000 corporations including Toyota, Lexus, and Blue Cross of California.

Sarah is a frequent speaker on social networking and online community building best practices at conferences and meetings worldwide.
